name: Microscopic Love
description:
Microscopic Love is a game about a bacteria who needs to rescue it's love by reaching the brain of it's host. It has to fight the imune system in order to live it's lovestory <3

Controls: ASDW - Move; Mouse: Aim; Mouse Left-buttom: Shoot

To do: Sound, storyline, upgrades.

This Game was made for the #botecoJam2
